metadata.title: Mozilla Firefox 38.* ESR 32-bit is installed on Windows
metadata.description: This definition is designed to ensure that Firefox version 38+ is installed, ensure a local-settings.js file exists, and a location for the mozilla.cfg file exists

notes.note: Firefox Installation and Configuration File Existence

criterion.comment: the installed operating system is part of the Microsoft Windows family
Ensure the Firefox version is at least 38
Ensure the Firefox version is less than 39

metadata.title: Ensure local-settings.js exists and is configured as expected
metadata.description: Ensure local-settings.js exists and is configured as expected

criterion.comment: Ensure a file named '[Firefox Install Location]\defaults\pref\local-settings.js' Exists
Ensure a setting named 'general.config.filename' Exists in [Firefox Install Location]\defaults\pref\local-settings.js
Ensure the Mozilla Config file specified by the 'general.config.filename' property in '[Firefox Install Location]\defaults\pref\local-settings.js' Exists

metadata.title: (L1) Enable Information Bar for Outdated Plugins
metadata.description: (L1) Enable Information Bar for Outdated Plugins

metadata.title: (L1) Ensure Update-related UI Components are Displayed
metadata.description: (L1) Ensure Update-related UI Components are Displayed

metadata.title: (L2) Do Not Send Cross SSL/TLS Referrer Header
metadata.description: (L2) Do Not Send Cross SSL/TLS Referrer Header

metadata.title: (L1) Disallow JavaScript's Ability to Change the Status Bar Text
metadata.description: (L1) Disallow JavaScript's Ability to Change the Status Bar Text

metadata.description: (L1) Disable Displaying JavaScript in History URLs

metadata.description: (L1) Do Not Accept Third Party Cookies

metadata.title: (L1) Set Delay for Enabling Security Sensitive Dialog Boxes
metadata.description: (L1) Set Delay for Enabling Security Sensitive Dialog Boxes

metadata.title: (L1) Enable Warning for External Protocol Handler
metadata.description: (L1) Enable Warning for External Protocol Handler

metadata.title: (L1) Set Extension Update Interval Time Checks
metadata.description: (L1) Set Extension Update Interval Time Checks

metadata.title: (L1) Disable JAR from Opening Unsafe File Types
metadata.description: (L1) Disable JAR from Opening Unsafe File Types

family_test.comment: the installed operating system is part of the Microsoft Windows family

textfilecontent54_test.comment: Ensure 'general.config.obscure' is set to 0 in local-settings.js

family_object.comment: This is the default family object. Only one family object should exist.

sid_sid_object.comment: all SIDs except Administrators and SYSTEM

config filename

external_variable.comment: Ensure local-settings.js exists and is properly configured
